title: 97/315/EC: Commission Decision of 30 April 1997 amending, as regards certain Spanish regions, Decision 93/52/EEC recording the compliance by certain Member States or regions with the requirements relating to brucellosis (B. melitensis) and according them the status of a Member State or region officially free of the disease (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 30 April 1997 amending, as regards certain Spanish regions, Decision 93/52/EEC recording the compliance by certain Member States or regions with the requirements relating to brucellosis (B. melitensis) and according them the status of a Member State or region officially free of the disease (Text with EEA relevance) (97/315/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following paragraph is added to Annex II ('Regions`) to Decision 93/52/EEC:
'In Spain: Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Las Palmas`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 April 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
